short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toy extension to replace every occurence of the string 'al' with 'aal'.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A toy exention that replaces every occurence of the string 'al' with 'aal'. It can be used to lighten up your online browsing activities (should not be used while researching important stuff)
